info.name: ocDownloader
info.summary: Easy to use download manager for Nextcloud
info.description: Easy to use download manager using Curl/Aria2 and youtube-dl to allow downloading HTTP(S), FTP(S), YouTube videos and BitTorrent files. For more information on how to install, please go to https://github.com/e-alfred/ocdownloader/blob/master/README.md
info.author: e-alfred
Nibbels
Xavier Beurois
